thread.title: 15 last minute Valentine’s gifts that’ll save your gift-forgetting a**
thread.title_full: 15 last minute Valentine’s gifts that’ll save your gift-forgetting a**

author: Emily Burns
title: 15 last minute Valentine’s gifts that’ll save your gift-forgetting a**
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Alright gents, tomorrow is Valentine’s Day and if you’re currently smacking yourself in the face because once again you’ve managed to forget a gift, we’ve got your back. Thankfully, Amazon has an abundance of affordable products that your lady is sure to love and yes, they can be overnighted. 
So before you get yourself into more trouble, peruse this list and find her the perfect gift that lets her know just how much she matters because you totally did not forget about her. You’re welcome. 2 
1. This tin of chocolates that are as hot as your love 
Get it on Amazon for $7.45 3 
2. This clever notepad that gets straight to the point 
Get it on Amazon for $6.27 4 
3. This fill-in-the-blank book that will help you express all of your feelings 
Get it on Amazon for $6.93 5 
4. This lego rose and heart necklace bundle 
Get it on Amazon for $29.99 Advertisement
